name: Bike Stunt Rider: Speedy
description:
Bike Stunt Rider: Speedy game is now in your mobile. If you have driving guts then ready to perform dare devil stuns here you go daring tracks on your bike. This is new and unique super-fast simulation game. Stunning graphics, extreme moto trail stunt bike engine physics and fast-paced action stunt gameplay makes it #1 racing adventure game. Prepare yourself for mad stunts, thrill and action on impossible tracks. In this game you feel like a real stunt man and ride your bike on tricky challenging paths. The beautiful terrain, amazing animation and wonderful environment just created for your amazing insane tricks.
Start your ultra-speed sports bike, grab the handlebars and do crazy stunts in the open air hard tracks. There are only three things in these tracks air, swerve and speed. Collect speed boosters for speed up and checkpoints to reach on higher distance. Mater your skills drive jump and smash on ramps. Drive carefully there is many obstacles and hurdles on the paths those create problems for you in the way. Feel the power of modern bikes.
Sit behind the wheel and remove your stunt hunger. Drive on fastest speed, do crazy tricks on space to prove that you are the toughest and competent bike rider. Your main object is to perform crazy stunts and reach at the destination in given time. If you lose the tempo maybe you fall off from your bike in the space and level will be failed. Create a balance between speed and grip.
Finish your missions and get extra gold coins as reward which helps you to purchase more advanced bikes. Every next level is more excited and challenging from previous one. This Bike Stunt Rider: Speedy is for racing game lovers. Interesting missions and intuitive controls makes it best among other stunt games. Download this game now it is good time killer.

Features:
Realistic physics based bikes
Unique, dangerous and rough stunts in the air
Upgradeable motorbikes
Easy but challenging stunts game play
Variety of different bikes
Superb 3d graphics & animations
Different deadly missions
Easy to hard designed levels
